data: ISic003341. Public honorific dedication to [---]ius Hirtianus

Facsimile Images

[--- mu]nicip(- - -) ( vac. )
[--- ]io Hirtian[o ---]
[---] Qui(rina) ( vac. 3) Lupo [---]

Apparatus criticus

Text of ILipara

English translation

[---] municip(...). (Dedicated to) [---]ius Hirtianus (? and) [---] Lupus, of the Quirina voting-tribe (?) [---]

Italian translation

[---] municip(...). (Dedicato a) [...]ius Hirtianus (?e) [---] Lupus, della tribù Quirina (?)[---]

commentary

Korhonen and Soraci 2019: 108 at n.74 suggest that a second individual is named in line 3, but note that therefore the first person would be seemingly lacking both filiation and tribal, and therefore a single person with possibly more than three onomastic elements seems perhaps simpler.
